attributes.action: Use all possible means to force the Icelandic Government to repay the compensation paid to British savers during the collapse of Icesave
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When Icelandic Bank "Icesave" collapsed the UK Government paid more than £2 billion in compensation to British savers. In early January 2010 the Icelandic President vetoed the plan to repay the funds. We, the undersigned, petition the Prime Minister to use all possible means to force the Icelandic Government to repay the full amount, with interest.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
